demolition

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObjects
      • demolition.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends GameObjects
    Represents a bomb utilized by the Player

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int FRAMES_PER_SPRITE_BOMB
      Represents the number of frames each sprite will be rendered.
      protected int NUM_OF_SPRITE_BOMB
      Represents the number of sprites to be rendered in one cycle.
      protected double TIME_PER_SPRITE_BOMB
      Represents the time each sprite shoud be rendered before moving to onto the next sprite of the cycle.
      protected int TOTAL_FRAMES_BOMB
      Represents the total number of frames the bomb will be rendered in one cycle.
      protected int TOTAL_FRAMES_EXPLOSION
      Represents the total number of frames the explosion will be rendered in one cycle.

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.GameObjects

        FPS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb(Tuple location)
      Creates a new bomb object, requires location which the bomb is placed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Draws the bomb and explosion sprites on the app window.

      Returns the horizontal component of the bomb's location in pixels.
      int pixelY(int yCoord)
      Returns the vertical component of the bomb's location in pixels.
      static void setup(PApplet app)
      Loads in all the sprites required to generate the bomb and explotion animation on the app.
      void tick(BomberMap map, Player player, java.util.List<RedEnemy> reds, java.util.List<YellowEnemy> yellows)
      The bomb will explode when it is rendered for the specified amount of frames.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup(PApplet app)
        Loads in all the sprites required to generate the bomb and explotion animation on the app. Requires the app of the game.
        Parameters:
        app - App of the game.

      • pixelX

        public int pixelX(int xCoord)
        Returns the horizontal component of the bomb's location in pixels.
        Parameters:
        xCoord - The x coordinate of the bomb.
        Returns:
        value in pixels

      • pixelY

        public int pixelY(int yCoord)
        Returns the vertical component of the bomb's location in pixels.
        Parameters:
        yCoord - The y coordinate of the bomb.
        Returns:
        value in pixels

      • tick

        public void tick(BomberMap map,
                 Player player,
                 java.util.List<RedEnemy> reds,
                 java.util.List<YellowEnemy> yellows)
        The bomb will explode when it is rendered for the specified amount of frames. This will trigger an explosion which will kill characters and demolish "Broken" tiles within the explosion area.
        Parameters:
        map - Map of the current level.
        player - Player
        reds - List of red enemies on the map.
        yellows - List of yellow enemies on the map.

      • draw

        public void draw(PApplet app)
        Draws the bomb and explosion sprites on the app window. Require Papplet object.
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app of the game.
